item.check_in.path_planner.no_ord: To select a path, the Check-in Point must have an ordinal number
item.check_in.path_planner.unselected: No selected path, press shift and right click to select

item.check_in.path_planner.set_different: Set ordinal to %d in a dimension different from last point

sanitize.check_in.invalid_number: %s is not in a valid numeric format
